sentence: Joe Kent Washington, 3rd congressional district Kent is running to unseat Rep. Jamie Herrera Beutler, R-Wash., who voted to impeach Trump after the Capitol riot, and is the most prominent candidate backed by the "Insurrection Caucus," meaning Trump allies like Greene, Boebert, Rep. Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina and Rep. Matt Gaetz of Florida.
author: Igor Derysh
title: Meet the scariest Republican candidates of 2022: It wasn't easy to pick 'em

sentence: A day after Mr. McCarthy reprimanded Representative Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina for saying that colleagues in Washington had held orgies and used cocaine, Mr. Trump awarded Mr. Cawthorn a coveted speaking slot at his next rally.
title: Mar-a-Lago Machine: Trump as a Modern-Day Party Boss
